trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKZF005_03464_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> This lionhearted hunter would see what an ally of Ronka is made of.
TEXT_LUCKZF005_03464_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the lionhearted hunter.
TEXT_LUCKZF005_03464_TODO_01<tab>Slay the foraging does.
TEXT_LUCKZF005_03464_TODO_02<tab>Speak with the lionhearted hunter.
TEXT_LUCKZF005_03464_TODO_03<tab>Search the Wild Fete.
TEXT_LUCKZF005_03464_TODO_04<tab>Speak with the lionhearted hunter.
TEXT_LUCKZF005_03464_TODO_05<tab>Speak with the lionhearted hunter again.
TEXT_LUCKZF005_03464_TODO_06<tab>Speak with the lionhearted hunter one last time.
TEXT_LUCKZF005_03464_VIISHUNTER03464_000_001<tab>You there, perhaps you can accompany me on a patrol of the wood.
TEXT_LUCKZF005_03464_VIISHUNTER03464_000_002<tab>As an ally of Ronka, it may serve you well to see how we Viis ensure the safety of our sacred sites. Do you not agree?
TEXT_LUCKZF005_03464_VIISHUNTER03464_000_003<tab>Splendid! Very well, we begin at once. I shall await you at Bowrest.

TEXT_LUCKZF005_03464_VIISHUNTER03464_000_010<tab>Shhh! We must be quiet. Look there, in the brush. A pair of afflicted does seeks refuge, but they cannot escape their fate. I shall draw them out─you do the rest.
TEXT_LUCKZF005_03464_VIISHUNTER03464_000_011<tab>Do not hesitate! Your prey is before you!
TEXT_LUCKZF005_03464_VIISHUNTER03464_000_030<tab>What skill! Truly you are worthy of your title. I only said your prey was weakened to embolden you, but it appears that was unnecessary.
TEXT_LUCKZF005_03464_VIISHUNTER03464_000_031<tab>Well then, let us proceed. You have proven your mettle, so it would be best for us to patrol separate routes from now on.
TEXT_LUCKZF005_03464_VIISHUNTER03464_000_032<tab>Look after the area near the Wild Fete. I shall depart to the Morning Stars.
TEXT_LUCKZF005_03464_VIISHUNTER03464_000_033<tab>Once you have finished, meet back here. Be safe.
TEXT_LUCKZF005_03464_SYSTEM03464_000_040<tab>An arrow pierces the hide of the caracal. It appears to have fallen in a single shot.
TEXT_LUCKZF005_03464_VIISHUNTER03464_000_050<tab>You are returned already. I take it your patrol was as uneventful as mine.
TEXT_LUCKZF005_03464_VIISHUNTER03464_000_051<tab>What? A single arrow? Impossible...can it be?
TEXT_LUCKZF005_03464_VIISHUNTER03464_000_052<tab>(-Frightened Voice-)Gaaaaaahhh!
TEXT_LUCKZF005_03464_VIISHUNTER03464_000_053<tab>Did you hear that? From deep in the wood...someone crying out for help. She may be in danger─we must help!

TEXT_LUCKZF005_03464_VIISHUNTER03464_000_060<tab>As we feared, she was attacked. Luckily, a Watcher struck down her aggressor before she came to any serious harm. An uncommon occurrence, but it is not unheard of to see one while they are hunting.
TEXT_LUCKZF005_03464_VIISHUNTER03464_000_061<tab>Doubtless the caracal you sighted was his doing as well. He must have fled into the wood when you arrived.
TEXT_LUCKZF005_03464_VIISHUNTER03464_000_062<tab>At any rate, we must treat her. Let us return to Fanow.
TEXT_LUCKZF005_03464_VIISHUNTER03464_000_070<tab>That was quite eventful for a first patrol. To think that you would meet one of the wood's Watchers.

TEXT_LUCKZF005_03464_VIISHUNTER03464_000_071<tab>Hmm, perhaps 'meet' is not the right word. If only I could have introduced you as one of Ronka's allies. Alas, it seems that our guardian had other plans.

TEXT_LUCKZF005_03464_VIISHUNTER03464_000_072<tab>The day was far from a disappointment, however. With your help we were able to guide a wounded ally to safety. You are welcome to join me again any time you wish.
